name: Silver dressings
title: Prescribing of silver dressings
compared with prescribing of all dressings
description: compared with prescribing of all dressings
why_it_matters: href:='https://www.nice.org.uk/advice/ktt14/chapter/evidence-context'>NICE states : There is at present no robust clinical- or cost-effectiveness evidence to support the use of antimicrobial dressings
(for example, silver, iodine or honey) over non-medicated dressings for preventing or treating chronic wounds.
Indiscriminate use should be discouraged because of concerns over bacterial resistance and toxicity.
numerator_where: (bnf_code like '20%' AND (bnf_name LIKE '%Silv%' OR bnf_name LIKE '% Ag %'))
